summary: Dovahyol Castle is a home for the Dovahkiin. It has everything you need including all the standard.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
-REQUIREMENTS-

Dawnguard


-DISCRIPTION-

Dovahyol Castle is a home for the Dovahkiin. It has everything you need including all the standard.

- Storage areas including barrels, chests, strongboxes, satchels & knapsacks.
- Blacksmith crafting area.
- Alchemy & enchanting areas.
- Bedroom.
- Cooking spit.
- Shrines.
- Display mannequins, plaques & cases.
- Bookshelves.
- An iron mine.
- Stables.
- Vendors.
- Trainers.
- Guards.
- A Throne room.


As well as a few nonstandard displays including.

- Display pedestals for Dragon claws.
- A daedric artefact display room.
- A Display stand for the Dragon Elder Scroll.
- A Display pedestal for Arvak's Skull
- Compatible for moving your spouse into.
- Display Busts for Dragon masks.
- Display stand for quest staves.

See picture for map location.

With the exception of some shields all items shown in the pictures on mannequins, pedestals and stands are not included.
author: cartman310534
